p.s: What in GodsGod's name am I supposed to do now.
I have successfully managed to keep my distance to Gatsby for all those years because I know how much distress it would cause me.
How am I supposed to talk to Tom about this?
Would he even care to listen to me?
I bet Jay would.
I remember all the talks we used to have.
We got along so good!
But this cannot happen, not after all that has happened those years ago.
Why would he want to meet me so suddenly after leaving me?
What has my life become so that I am sitting here, married with a kid and think about the possibility of getting back to my teenage lover.
Why did Jay had to leave me in the first place and why did I have to marry a menman that does not love me.
I let myself get torn apart by two men of which one loves me and the other one does not.
Am I capable of getting into a healthy relationship that won't leave me shattered in pieces.
They both took the happiness out of me by treating my like a choice.
Tom is the worst man to ever be married to.
He left me alone at our daughtersdaughter's birth and now he has a misstressmistress.
Maybe it would not be so bad after all to get back into contact with Jay again.
I am sure he could bring back a little piece of my lost happiness.
God, I am still in love with him!
I wonder if he has changed a lot since I last saw him.
He is acting strange right now and I do not know if I like this behaviour.
Do I even know him anymore?
He could have changed so much.
I heard several different rumours about how he got wealthy and how he got to New York and I do not like any of them.
Is he inflicted in a shady business?
What if the war changed him.
No one really knows anything about him these days.
He is so misteriousmysterious!
I have to get to know him again and hear his story.
I want to know every little detail about him and I want to listen to him talk for hours like in the old days.
Tom probably would not notice me being away for so long.
I finally want to be loved again and I want to be treated like I deserve to be treated.
